short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your data entry with environment-based tags and slash commands for quick auto-population.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SlashFill is an innovative Chrome extension designed for developers and QA professionals who work with multiple web pages and need to input repetitive data. With SlashFill, you can effortlessly manage and auto-fill your data using custom slash commands, making your workflow more efficient and error-free.

Key Features:

Efficient Data Management: SlashFill allows you to store various tokens, credentials, and other essential data securely. With the ability to tag data based on different environments like development, staging, and production, you can easily organize and access your data as needed.

Instant Data Auto-Fill: Instead of manually copying and pasting data, simply use slash commands within any input field to auto-populate your stored data. SlashFillâ€™s intelligent auto-fill feature saves you time and reduces the risk of human error.

Import and Export Functionality: SlashFill supports importing and exporting data to and from JSON files. Share your data effortlessly with your peers or back it up for future use, ensuring that your data is always accessible and secure.

Local Storage: All data is stored locally on your device. SlashFill prioritizes your privacy and ensures that your data never leaves your computer.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a clean and intuitive interface that integrates seamlessly with your browser. The popup is designed with ease of use in mind, providing a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Customizable Environment Tags: Manage different environments efficiently by tagging your data. This feature allows you to quickly switch between development, staging, and production data, streamlining your workflow.
